headline: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (HWM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Howmet Aerospace Inc. on X.com by qualitybargain. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HWM. Howmet Aerospace Inc.’s share was trading at $178.98 as of September 9th. HWM’s trailing and forward P/E were 52.33 and 41.15 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
